name: Tiktaalik's Tale
description:
Play as a handsome tiktaalik in this short platform style game starring one! This game was created for the 1st week-long Godot Wild Jam.

This first version of the game is very punishing with a hardcore one-hit death mechanic. This is due to me not setting aside enough time to properly implement health, knockback or feedback. The AI is also rather simple to make up for this.

Programmer: AGamerAaron

Sprite & tile artist: Bojidar Marinov
